page.title: 20MOORS FARM
page.content: Moors Farm is situated on the Loughborough Moors and is a six acre small-holding.This site was mentioned in the Doomsday Book 900 years ago.The tenant has rented the property for five years. Although the farm is very isolated, the farmer and his wife like it there.Their nearest neighbour lives half a mile away and the nearest shop is one mile away.They live very near to a main railway line and the River Soar.Unfortunately they have no record of when the house was built for a{ {farming}family. The small-holder works a night shift at the Gotham British Gypsum mine.The small-holding consists of sheep,cows, a goat and chickens.Machinery is borrowed or rented,and people are only employed for hay making.
